instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Mix ham, ground pork, eggs, and bread crumbs in a bowl. Mix in enough bread crumbs to make it all stick together. Put in a loaf pan and bake for about 1 hour to 1 1/2 hours. Glaze the last 15 minutes of baking.
To make glaze: Mix brown sugar, mustard and soy sauce together in a bowl.
title: Ham Loaf II
sentences: Mix ham, ground pork, eggs, and bread crumbs in a bowl.
Mix in enough bread crumbs to make it all stick together.
Put in a loaf pan and bake for about 1 hour to 1 1/2 hours.
Glaze the last 15 minutes of baking.
To make glaze: Mix brown sugar, mustard and soy sauce together in a bowl.
